metadata.title: CVE-2019-6975 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Django 1.11.x before 1.11.19, 2.0.x before 2.0.11, and 2.1.x before 2.1.6allows Uncontrolled Memory Consumption via a malicious attacker-suppliedvalue to the django.utils.numberformat.format() function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6975` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.8
python-django-common - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.8
python3-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.7-1ubuntu5.8').
